comment.author: 11418107@N02
comment._content: Marion HOLLINS (1892-1944), horsewoman and golf champion: www.svchamber.org/svhistory/history/hollins.htm

comment.author: 8623220@N02
comment._content: Thanks for pointing out that the correct spelling of her name is "Hollins." We'll fix it in our source data (which will enable people to find her more easily alongside other photographs of her in our online catalog - www.loc.gov/rr/print/catalog.html ) and then reload the data to Flickr.

comment.author: 70251312@N00
comment._content: When will the data be reloaded?

comment.author: 70251312@N00
comment._content: LOC, I repeat my query of 14 months ago: When will the data be reloaded?

comment.author: 70251312@N00
comment._content: New York society bluebloods attending the horse races at Belmont Park, on June 17, 1913. A story in the next day's New York Times reported the roster of winners: query.nytimes.com/mem/archive-free/pdf?_r=1&res=9406E...

comment.author: 8623220@N02
comment._content:
Hi Wystan,
We're aiming now for October 2010 to "reload the data." Several thousand catalog records are involved, so it's a major operation to replace that many descriptions. We've done it before, but far fewer records were involved. I'll admit to worrying that we'll unintentionally bump out parts of the description that should be kept. You're right, though, to point out that we need to get cracking! 
-- Helena

comment.author: 70251312@N00
comment._content: Helena, it would be nice if LOC could get rid of the palpably untrue statement, "This photo was taken some time in 1910," which appears at the top of every page of the Bain Agency photostream on Flickr. Can that happen in October also?

comment.author: 8623220@N02
comment._content: I'll check.  It might need to be separate changes ... first the description area, then the date field.
